```{r}
data_set <- read.csv(file = 'synthetic_data.csv')
head(data_set)
summary(data_set) 
medication_list <- c(colnames(data_set)[14:36])
#print(medication_list)

data_set_reformatted <- gather(data_set,medication,value,metformin:metformin.pioglitazone)
   #  na.rm = FALSE, convert = FALSE 

head(data_set_reformatted)  

```

```{r}
# groupby the different medications 
medications_dataframe <- data_set_reformatted %>% 
  group_by(medication) %>% summarise(n())

medications_dataframe 

```
